ValidationRule.description: Created for YODA. Fields that are required for the "Develop" stage of Opportunities in the "Product" record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c ), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Develop'), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Competition_Positioning__c,""), ISBLANK( RFQ_Received_Date__c), ISBLANK(Application__c), ISPICKVAL(Category_of_Interest__c,""), ISBLANK( End_User__c), ISBLANK(Amount) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To mark 'Develop' stage as complete, please ensure below key fields are populated: Competition Positioning, RFQ Received Date with "Qualify(SQL)" stage required fields.
